title: Martin Leslie (rugby union)
text: Martin Leslie (born 25 October 1971, <a href="Wellington">Wellington</a>, <a href="New%20Zealand">New Zealand</a>) is a New Zealand born former professional <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player who played provincial rugby for Wellington and the Hurricanes before moving to play international rugby for <a href="Scotland">Scotland</a>, for whom he qualified through grandparents. He played primarily in the back row, winning 37 caps between 1998 and 2003. His brother <a href="John%20Leslie%20%28rugby%20player%29">John</a> also played for Scotland at the same time as him.
